messages.messageBody:
Oops! Well I guess I found out how to post messages!

Anyhooo.....Hello everyone! My name is Holly and I have two girls. Lili
who is age 4, and Tacy who is age 2. We are a military family stationed on
Terciera Island, in the Azores, Portugal. I don't know much about
unschooling but It sounds very interesting and I want to learn more about
it. I started Homeschooling Lili last fall using the Oak Meadow Preschool
curriculum. Im really happy that I found this list though because Im
always looking for more ideas.
________________________________________________________________________
